text: The Camden Indians were an American basketball team based in Camden, New Jersey that was a member of the American Basketball League. During the 1942/43 season, the team became the Brooklyn Indians on January 18, 1943. ==Year-by- year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1942/43 |ABL |N/A |N/A |} Category:Defunct basketball teams in the United States Category:Basketball teams in New Jersey Category:Sports in Camden, New Jersey Category:1942 establishments in New Jersey Category:1943 disestablishments in New Jersey Category:Basketball teams established in 1942 Category:Basketball teams disestablished in 1943
title: Camden Indians
